steps.content: Use â€œFffâ€ to complain about bad friends to the people you appreciate most. You can use this acronym if youâ€™re frustrated with people and you want to rant a bit. steps.content: Agree to follow them if you want more followers. steps.title: Stay on top of new texting slang with these common acronyms.
steps.content: Stay on top of new texting slang with these common acronyms.
